idpmanagement.addIdpSubheadline: Enter an IdP name and choose the idp type to start the configuration
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline:
Configure your idp connection. Retrieve the metadata config file from your local idp and upload the same in the input field below. Additionally the client_id and secret are needed.
Follow the
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline2: to find a number of examples of local idp's such as Azure, Keycloak, etc.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSubheadline: This will open another option for people from your company to sign.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSuccessSubheadline: Go and test the login now
idpmanagement.disableIdpSubheadline: This will remove the option to sign in for people of your company
idpmanagement.description: Here you can manage how the users of your company authenticate with Catena-X. On registration we have created an IDP with one user entry for the admin (that's probably you ;). Many companies already have their own IDP where users authenticate using their known company user id and a familiar login mask. In this case you will probably prefer to use your own company IDP and you can create and manage the federation on this page.

idpdetail.title: Identity Provider Details
idpdetail.selectIpsText: Select the type of IdP which should get newly created
idpdetail.addMetaDataText: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, load. then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.
idpdetail.idp_meta_description: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, Load then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.

page.title: Identity Provider Config
page.desc: Here you can manage how the users of your company authenticate with Catena-X. On registration we have created an IDP with one user entry for the admin (that's probably you ;). Many companies already have their own IDP where users authenticate using their known company user id and a familiar login mask. In this case you will probably prefer to use your own company IDP and you can create and manage the federation on this page.

add.title: New IdP Connection
add.subtitle: Enter an IdP name and choose the idp type to start the configuration

users.title: Link existing users to new IdP
users.subtitle: Make sure users can continue working
